Uses of Package
edu.bu.segrelab.comets

Classes in edu.bu.segrelab.comets used by edu.bu.segrelab.comets
AbstractTool
          An abstract tool class for use with the CometsSetupPanel.
Cell
          The basic, abstract Cell class for use with the COMETS program.
Comets
          The base class for running the COMETS program.
CometsConstants
          A handy way to avoid having to write CometsConstants.XXXXX over and over throughout the program - just have most of the classes implement this.
CometsParameters
          This implements a set of global parameters used throughout the COMETS program.
CometsSetupPanel
          The CometsSetupPanel has the role of letting the user initialize and customize the contents of the world before running a simulation.
CometsToolbarPanel
          This implements a toolbar for use with the CometsSetupPanel.
DataContentPanel
          An extended JPanel that contains an editable list of names and values.
Model
          The abstract base class for a model to be used in COMETS simulations.
PencilTool
          The PencilTool is a part of the tool palette used in modifying the initial layout in the CometsSetupPanel.
World2D
          The World2D is, along with the Model and Cell classes, the main scientific part of the COMETS program.
